HomePage.description: Passionate about creating engaging user interfaces and transform ideas into responsive, high-performance websites.

AboutPage.title: About me
AboutPage.description: With 4 years of expertise in frontend development and UI/UX design, I specialize in building seamless user experiences. Proficient in Angular, I develop dynamic interfaces, integrate microservices, and implement secure authentication. I've developed custom WordPress plugins using PHP and JavaScript, and built scalable RESTful APIs with NestJs and TypeOrm. Experienced in Git for version control on GitHub and GitLab, I excel in Scrum environments, demonstrating leadership, teamwork, and project management skills.

data1.title: Freelancer
data1.description: I develop custom user interface solutions for various companies. A footwear client increased their sales by 15% after launching their SEO-optimized WordPress site. I also handle updates and improvements on previous projects, focusing on interface aesthetics and functionality.

data2.title: Hexa Solutions S.A.S.
data2.description: I led the development of a WordPress portal, creating custom plugins and optimizing SEO to rank for key terms like 'digital credit'. I redesigned an Angular-based payment gateway, reducing abandonment rates from 35% to 20%, and collaborated on web applications using Angular and NestJs.

data3.title: Hyperlink S.A.S
data3.description: I designed a reusable template base in Bootstrap for headers, forms, and sidebars, customizable to client requirements, enabling the creation of adaptable portals with optimized load times.

data4.title: Roojotech S.A.S
data4.description: I developed an administrative platform using Microsoft Power Platform, improving the management of information previously handled in Excel, which increased the companyâ€™s operational efficiency.
